channel.title: WebGL on Shallow Brook Software
channel.description: Recent content in WebGL on Shallow Brook Software

item.title: Why Write?
item.description: How long has it been since my last post? Let’s see… about a week shy of 3 years! Blogging is one of those “things I’d like to do more of” but never make time for. I’ve still been writing code since my last post but I haven’t written about any of it. I ran my own software company for a while, got a new job at a Silicon Valley startup, and even got married!
